channel.title: 2 things regarding bots
channel.description:
Anyone notice the amount of autotyping chinese gold sellers?
http://rsbuddy.com/forum/dev-blog-rsbuddy-bans-auto-talking-scripts-115083.html
FINALLY
And also... a pk assistant has been released.. which is said to actually predict hits... and uh.. well just read this.. http://www.rsbots.net/bots/AutoPKAssistant-Pro/
And they are deving a merch bot too.. discuss.

item.title: 2 things regarding bots
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Some things shouldn’t be messed with.
Fair enough hunter wc etc (basically staple skills) being botted but these type of things…:/.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 things regarding bots
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I predict hits based on the XP meter. o___O;

Anyways, anyone know where I can download an autotyper that will still function in the background? …meaning I can minimize it and it will still autotalk? thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 things regarding bots
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

HcoJustin:

Who says they aren’t running RSBuddy in dev mode to load their auto talker locally? And like Andrew said, the others have been around for quite a while

Seems like these chinese gold farmers are really dumb; I wouldn’t think they knew how to do that, but they might just switch to powerbot unless they took out their talkers too

Read full topic

item.title: 2 things regarding bots
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

We already talked about this a few months ago. Also the pking assistants (quick switchers) came out a long time ago. Merching bots have also been around for a while, most gold sites use them (flipping) cause its so easy and fool proof.

Read full topic
